targets.expr: (sum(jvm_memory_bytes_used{area="heap", environment="$environment", app="batch", batch_id="$batch_id"})*100) / sum(jvm_memory_bytes_max{area="heap", environment="$environment", app="batch", batch_id="$batch_id"})

jvm_memory_bytes_used{environment="$environment", app="batch", batch_id="$batch_id"} / ignoring(area) group_left java_lang_operatingsystem_totalphysicalmemorysize{environment="$environment", app="batch", batch_id="$batch_id"} * 100
jvm_memory_pool_bytes_max{pool="PS Eden Space", environment="$environment", app="batch", batch_id="$batch_id"}
jvm_memory_pool_bytes_used{pool="PS Eden Space", environment="$environment", app="batch", batch_id="$batch_id"}
jvm_memory_pool_bytes_committed{pool="PS Eden Space", environment="$environment", app="batch", batch_id="$batch_id"}
jvm_memory_pool_bytes_max{pool="PS Old Gen", environment="$environment", app="batch", batch_id="$batch_id"}
jvm_memory_pool_bytes_used{pool="PS Old Gen", environment="$environment", app="batch", batch_id="$batch_id"}
jvm_memory_pool_bytes_committed{pool="PS Old Gen", environment="$environment", app="batch", batch_id="$batch_id"}
jvm_memory_pool_bytes_max{pool="PS Survivor Space", environment="$environment", app="batch", batch_id="$batch_id"}
jvm_memory_pool_bytes_used{pool="PS Survivor Space", environment="$environment", app="batch", batch_id="$batch_id"}
jvm_memory_pool_bytes_committed{pool="PS Survivor Space", environment="$environment", app="batch", batch_id="$batch_id"}
